name: Foley
bio: Foley is an Auckland-based pop duo made up of Ash Wallace and Gabriel Everett. Blending bright synths, funk grooves, and heartfelt lyrics, they craft infectious alt-pop songs with emotional depth. Since their 2020 debut, Foley has earned acclaim with tracks like “Midnight” and “Fever,” solidifying their place in Aotearoa's modern pop scene.
